description: Marasinghe Mudiyanselage Chandrani Kanthilatha Vs. Registrar of Co-operative Societies and Commissioner of Co - operative Development and 3 Others before Hon. K. M. S. DISSANAYAKE, J

keywords: Appeal-Vires of Rule 49(xii)(a) of the Co-operative Societies Regulations 1973 read in conjunction with 58(3) of the North Central Province Co-operative Societies Statute of No. 5 of 2009 as amended-Definition of ratio decidendi and obiter dicta- Distinction between obiter dicta and judicial dicta-Legal effect of ratio decidendi, obiter dicta and judicial dicta-Doctrine of Approbation and Reprobation.
